response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our product, which has been meticulously crafted and valued at $1,000,000 by you, is now available for purchase. I understand its immense worth to you and am confident that it will serve as a valuable asset in your endeavors. To ensure that we both benefit from this transaction, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $900,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional value considering the product's quality and potential impact on your business or personal projects. I look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 900000}
